body: @izumichan morons everywhere, idiots has been born again.

@izumichan an objectively wrong opinion lmao. She's popular because she's a well written character in a well written event. Why can't she be popular in a game where people play for the story? How about you read actual in game story instead of fancomics and doujins that aren't canon next time before judging a character
melt is the worst character in fgo. why is she so popular?
